title: Freedom Flight
description: The Kilrathi Empire has launched an all-out attack on the Terran Confederation. Your missions will take you into the heart of enemy territory.
intro: The year is 2654. The Terran Confederation is locked in a deadly war with the Kilrathi Empire. As a pilot aboard the carrier TCS Tiger's Claw, you have been assigned to a series of crucial missions that could turn the tide of the war. Your skills in the cockpit will determine the fate of humanity.
outro: Thanks to your incredible piloting skills, the Kilrathi attack has been repelled. The Tiger's Claw and her crew owe you their lives. This victory marks a turning point in the war, but the Kilrathi threat remains. The Confederation will need your skills again soon, pilot.

missions.name: First Flight
missions.briefing: Welcome to your first combat mission, pilot. We've detected a Kilrathi scout wing with minimal escorts. Your orders are to engage and destroy all enemies in the area. This is a basic patrol, so expect light resistance - perfect for a rookie.
missions.debriefing: Nice work out there! You handled yourself well for a first mission. The intelligence we gathered from the destroyed scouts will be valuable for planning our next move against the Kilrathi forces.

missions.name: Asteroid Danger
missions.briefing: The Kilrathi are using a dense asteroid field as cover for their operations. Navigate through the field and collect intelligence by surviving as long as possible. Watch those rocks, pilot!
missions.debriefing: Impressive flying through that asteroid field! Few pilots have the skill to navigate such dangerous conditions. The data you collected reveals Kilrathi supply routes we can target in future operations.

missions.name: Ambush Point
missions.briefing: Intelligence suggests a Kilrathi transport will be passing through this sector soon. However, we suspect it's a trap. Your mission is to fly in, engage any enemies, and be prepared for unexpected resistance.
missions.debriefing: That was indeed an ambush! The Kilrathi were waiting with more ships than expected, but you handled it expertly. This victory has disrupted their supply lines significantly.

missions.name: Final Strike
missions.briefing: This is it, pilot. We've located a Kilrathi command ship coordinating attacks in this sector. Destroy it at all costs. Expect heavy resistance - they'll throw everything they have at you to protect their commander.
missions.debriefing: Outstanding work! The destruction of that command ship has thrown the Kilrathi forces into disarray. Your actions today have saved countless lives and given the Confederation a crucial advantage in this sector.
